Text.Page: (The secret lab... The origin of the Storm Barrier and the place where experiments are performed on live subjects. I wonder what other horrors await us here.)

You left Solyn and Paesen behind to solve the mystery of the Storm Barrier. In the process, you discovered a hidden cave.
The cave guarded by the Archdevan Imperial Army there was a strange gate.
After dispatching the guards, you found out that the gate leads to a secret laboratory.

I watched you dispatch those archdevas outside, . I'm sorry I couldn't help, but I was ready to go for help, if you needed it!

Zolyn is on her way."Okay. When she gets here, tell her I've gone ahead."
